## More articles by Laura B. Fox - What I Learned From My First

what_you_do: As a writing partner and book coach, Laura B. Fox has a passion for helping wise teachers and holistic healers who have a soul-driven message create books that bring their profound insights to the world.
who_you_serve: holistic healers, visionary coaches, and spiritual teachers
social_proof: Laura was listed among 15 Book Coaches to Follow in 2024 in the San Francisco Examiner. She has ghostwritten bestselling books on natural and spiritual living, holistic health, and self-confidence.
signature_programs: The Soul-Driven Author's Nonfiction Book Planning Guide
business_focus: Helping soul-driven authors create books that bring their profound insights to the world.
